Product title: Matte Black Towel Rack for Bathroom - 24" Rustproof Towel Holder, Sturdy Towel Bar Wall Mounted, Space-Saving Towel Hanger, Bathroom Accessories, Home Decor, Apparment Essentials
Key Features: STURDY & DURABLE:Made of high-quality aluminum alloy with φ 0.7×0.023 inch thick round tubes, the Powools towel rack is engineered for strength and stability. The durable aluminum material resists bending, corrosion, and daily wear, making it ideal for long-term use. Combined with secure drilling installation, it stays firmly in place. The premium waterproof and rustproof coating adds extra protection, while the smooth surface prevents towels from snags, tears, and scratches. | VERSATILE USE: Powools bathroom towel rack offers a reliable solution for your towel hanging needs. It can be used not only in the bathroom for towels, bathrobes, and even clothes but also in the kitchen for dishcloths or on the sink for hand towels. Experience the versatility and convenience of our towel rack! | SPACE-SAVING DESIGN: Powools towel bar for bathroom wall is ingeniously designed to maximize space utilization. Featuring a compact size and wall-mounted design, this towel rack can be easily mounted on walls or cabinets, making it ideal for small bathrooms or limited spaces. Say hello to a neat and organized bathroom with the Powools towel rack. | STYLISH & MODERN: Powools shower towel holder features a contemporary style that effortlessly complements any interior decor. With clean lines and exquisite craftsmanship, this towel rack makes a stunning addition to any space, be it your porch, laundry room, bathroom, kitchen, toilet, office, and more. Let's enjoy the perfect blend of style and function. | EASY TO INSTALL & MAINTAIN:Each Powools towel rack comes with all necessary mounting hardware and step-by-step instructions for a hassle-free setup. Simply connect the two metal tubes, attach the support bases, mark and drill holes, and secure the rack to the wall using the included screws and anchors. The smooth surface makes cleaning effortless — just a quick wipe keeps it looking brand new.
comment 1: Solid does the primary job of holding towels when pulled or added to rack. Clean lines easy to line up. Screws hold the bar up well. Dark is a neutral like silver and like the look in bathroom. I think having a screw in center or bar helps with additional weight support for towels. Very sturdy and attractive. - Kellie
comment 2: Very sturdy with elegant decor appearance. Hardware included with easy installation. - MKelly
comment 3: Very nice choice. Good size for a bathroom and very easy to install with the included drywall anchors. Although I do have some other bigger ones that I use because I already had them. Easy to mark these small screws. Feels pretty sturdy. - Angel
comment 4: Product works great, has just the right clearance for a normal towel. You won't smack your hand taking the towel off or putting it over the railing.  4 stars due to the very, very cheap anchor screw sets, & lack of details in the instructions.  Use your own plastic anchor mounts. Lightweight, goes together easy. Seems to be sturdy for the time. - garren carter
comment 5: This towel rack is very nice and it even looks elegant easy to put together convenient and it will last a long time. - Celeste locke
